thread.title: BAPE Is Dropping a New 1st Camo Shark Cap Collection
thread.title_full: BAPE Is Dropping a New 1st Camo Shark Cap Collection

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: BAPE Is Dropping a New 1st Camo Shark Cap Collection
text:
BAPE enthusiasts can look forward to a new release this weekend, as the streetwear mainstay has taken to social media to inform of a headwear collection arriving on February 18.
Per the Facebook post , we find the caps optioned in nine colorways, each boasting shark embroidered detail front and center. The two standouts from the range come in the form of a pair of camouflage iterations.
Again, you can look forward to this new headwear capsule from BAPE releasing on Saturday, February 18.
Just yesterday we highlighted a new glow-in-the-dark hoodie from A Bathing Ape.
